h, w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
castle = {}
(0..h-1).each do |i|
    l = gets.chomp
    (0..w-1).each do |j|
        c = l[j]
        if c != ?.
            castle[[i, j]] = c.to_i
        end
    end
end
count = 0
loop do
    unchanged = true
    new_castle = {}
    castle.each do |key, s|
        i, j = key
        n = (i-1..i+1).to_a.product((j-1..j+1).to_a).select {|y, x| !castle[[y, x]]}.size
        if n >= s
            unchanged = false
        else
            new_castle[key] = s
        end
    end
    break if unchanged
    count += 1
    castle = new_castle
end
p count

hight, width = gets.split(" ").map(&:to_i)

hight.times do |hig|
  castle << gets.split("").map(&:to_i)
end

def wave(castle)
  wave_count = 0
  break_array = []
   (1..castle.size).each do |hi|
    next if castle[hi].nil?
     (0..castle.first.size-1).each do |wi|
      next if castle[hi][wi].nil?
      next if castle[hi][wi] == 0 
      next if castle[hi][wi] > 8
      (hi-1..hi+1).each do |y|
        next if castle[y].nil?
        (wi-1..wi+1).each do |x|
          next if castle[y][x].nil?
          if castle[y][x] == 0
            castle[hi][wi] -= 1 
          end
        end
      end
      if 0 >= castle[hi][wi]
        break_array << [hi, wi]
        castle[hi][wi] = "done"
      end
    end
  end
  break_array.each {|h, w| castle[h][w] = 0}
  until break_array.empty?
    next_break_array = []
    break_array.each do |h, w|
      (h-1..h+1).each do |y|
        next if castle[y].nil?
        (w-1..w+1).each do |x|
          next if castle[y][x].nil?
          next if x == w && y == h
          if castle[y][x] != "done" && castle[y][x] > 0
            castle[y][x] -= 1 
            if castle[y][x] <= 0
              next_break_array << [y, x]
              castle[y][x] = "done"
            end
          end
        end
      end
    end
    next_break_array.each {|h, w| castle[h][w] = 0}
    break_array = next_break_array
    wave_count += 1
  end
  wave_count
end
puts wave(castle)

def calc(c, q, h, w)
  n = 0
  while q.size > 0
    e = q.shift
    n += 1 if e[0] > n
    (-1..1).each do |di|
      (-1..1).each do |dj|
        i = e[1][0] + di
        j = e[1][1] + dj
        if i >= 0 && i < h && j >= 0 && j < w
          q.push([e[0] + 1, [i, j]]) if (c[i][j] -= 1) == 0
        end
      end
    end
  end
  n
end
1.times do
  c, q = [], []
  h, w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  h.times do |i|
    c[i] = gets.chomp.split(//).map(&:to_i)
    c[i].each.with_index do |e, j|
      q.push([0, [i, j]]) if c[i][j] == 0
    end
  end
  puts calc(c, q, h, w)
end

def check_broken(width, height, maps, strength)
  count = 0
  (-1..1).each do |i|
    (-1..1).each do |j|
      next if i ==0 && j == 0
      if maps[width + i][height + j].zero?
        strength -= 1 
      end
      if strength < 1
        return true
      end
    end
  end
  return false
end

def check_can_break_area(start_width, end_width, start_height, end_height, maps)
  can_break_area = []
  for i in (start_width..end_width)
    for j in (start_height..end_height)
      strength = maps[i][j]
      next if strength.zero?
      can_break_area << [i, j] if 1 <= strength && strength < 9
    end
  end
  can_break_area
end

w, h = gets.split(" ").map(&:to_i)
maps = []
w.times do |i|
  chara = []
  gets.chomp.each_char do |char|
    if char == "." || (char.to_i) > 0
      chara << char.to_i
    end
  end
  maps << chara
end
can_break_area = check_can_break_area(1, w - 2, 1, h - 2, maps)
wave = 0
while true
  next_can_break_area = []
  can_break_area.each do |width, height|
    strength = maps[width][height]
    next_can_break_area << [width, height] if check_broken(width, height, maps, strength)
  end
  can_break_area = []
  next_can_break_area.each do |width, height|
    maps[width][height] = 0
  end
  next_can_break_area.each do |width, height|
    can_break_area += check_can_break_area(-1 + width, 1 + width, -1 + height, 1 + height, maps)
  end
  if next_can_break_area.length > 0
    wave += 1
  else
    break
  end
  can_break_area.uniq!
end

puts wave

def change(i, j)
  $cnt[i][j] = 0
  (-1..1).each do |y|
    (-1..1).each do |x|
      next if x == 0 && y == 0 || i+y < 0 || i+y >= $h || j+x < 0 || j+x >= $w
      $cnt[i+y][j+x] += 1
    end
  end
end 
$h, $w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
$fld = Array.new($h){ Array.new }
$h.times{ |i| $fld[i] = gets.chomp.gsub('.', '0').split('').map(&:to_i) }
$cnt = Array.new($h){ Array.new($w, 0) }
$h.times do |i|
  $w.times do |j|
    change(i, j) if $fld[i][j] == 0
  end
end
ret = 0
f = false
until f
  f = true
  arr = []
  (1...$h-1).each do |i|
    (1...$w-1).each do |j|
      if $fld[i][j] > 0 && $cnt[i][j] >= $fld[i][j]
        arr << [i, j] 
        f = false
      end
    end
  end
  arr.each{ |i, j| change(i, j); $fld[i][j] = 0 }
  ret += 1 unless f
end
p ret

def calc(c, q, h, w)
  n = 0
  while q.size > 0
    e = q.shift
    n += 1 if e[0] > n
    (-1..1).each do |di|
      (-1..1).each do |dj|
        i = e[1][0] + di
        j = e[1][1] + dj
        if i >= 0 && i < h && j >= 0 && j < w
          if (c[i][j] -= 1) == 0
            q.push([e[0] + 1, [i, j]])
          end
        end
      end
    end
  end
  n
end

h, w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
a = (1..h).map { gets.split("").map(&:to_i) }

queue = []
(1..h-1).each do |i|
    (0..w-1).each do |j|
        next if a[i][j] == 0
        (i-1..i+1).each do |y|
            (j-1..j+1).each do |x|
                a[i][j] -= 1 if a[y][x] == 0
            end
        end
        if a[i][j] <= 0
            queue << [i, j]
            a[i][j] = 'd'
        end
    end
end
queue.each do |i, j|
    a[i][j] = 0
end

count = 0
until queue.empty?
    new_queue = []
    queue.each do |i, j|
        (i-1..i+1).each do |y|
            (j-1..j+1).each do |x|
                next if y == i && x == j
                if a[y][x] != ?d && a[y][x] > 0
                    a[y][x] -= 1
                    if a[y][x] <= 0
                        new_queue << [y, x]
                        a[y][x] = ?d
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
    queue = new_queue
    queue.each do |i, j|
        a[i][j] = 0
    end
    count += 1
end
p count

h, w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
castle = {}
(0..h-1).each do |i|
    l = gets.chomp
    (0..w-1).each do |j|
        c = l[j]
        if c != ?.
            castle[[i, j]] = c.to_i
        end
    end
end

queue = []
castle.keys.each do |key|
    i, j = key
    n = (i-1..i+1).to_a.product((j-1..j+1).to_a).select {|y, x| !castle[[y, x]]}.size
    castle[key] -= n
    queue << key if castle[key] <= 0
end
castle.delete_if {|_, k| k <= 0}

count = 0
until queue.empty?
    new_queue = []
    queue.each do |i, j|
        (i-1..i+1).each do |y|
            (j-1..j+1).each do |x|
                next if y == i && x == j
                key = [y, x]
                if castle[key]
                    castle[key] -= 1
                    if castle[key] <= 0
                        new_queue << key
                        castle.delete(key)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
    queue = new_queue
    count += 1
end
p count

$sandpool = []
$check_points = []
$wave_count = 0
$break_points = []

def breakable?(castle)
    1 <= castle && castle < 9
end

def search_around(px, py)
    ((px - 1)..(px + 1)).each do |x|
        ((py - 1)..(py + 1)).each do |y|
            next if x == px && y == py
            yield(x, y)
        end
    end
end

def check_break_points
    $check_points.each do |i, j|
        castle = $sandpool[i][j]
        search_around(i, j) do |pi, pj|
            break if castle == 0
            castle -= 1 if $sandpool[pi][pj] == 0
        end
        $break_points << [i, j] if castle == 0
    end
end

def break_castles
    $break_points.each do |i, j|
        $sandpool[i][j] = 0
    end
end

def setup_next_check_points
    $check_points = []
    $break_points.each do |i, j|
        search_around(i, j) do |pi, pj|
            castle = $sandpool[pi][pj]
            $check_points << [pi, pj] if breakable?(castle)
        end
    end
    $check_points.uniq!
end

def broken?
    bool = $break_points.length > 0
    $break_points = []
    $wave_count += 1 if bool
    bool
end

def wave
    check_break_points
    break_castles
    setup_next_check_points
    broken?
end

# AOJ 0612
# http://judge.u-aizu.ac.jp/onlinejudge/description.jsp?id=0612

castle = []
cmp = []
h = w = 0
left = 0

def initial():
    global h, w, left
    left = h * w
    for i in range(0, h):
        left -= castle[i].count(0)
    for i in range(0, h):
        c = []
        for j in range(0, w):
            if castle[i][j] == 0:
                c.append(-99)
            else:
                a  = castle[i - 1][j - 1:j + 2].count(0)
                a += castle[i][j - 1: j + 2].count(0)
                a += castle[i + 1][j - 1: j + 2].count(0)
                c.append(a)
        cmp.append(c)

def wave(xy):
    global h, w, left
    z = []
    xy1 = []
    for i, j in xy:
        if castle[i][j] > 0 and castle[i][j] <= cmp[i][j]:
            castle[i][j] = 0
            left -= 1
            z.append((i, j))
    for i, j in z:
        cmp[i - 1][j - 1] += 1
        cmp[i - 1][j    ] += 1
        cmp[i - 1][j + 1] += 1
        cmp[i    ][j - 1] += 1
        cmp[i    ][j    ] = -99
        cmp[i    ][j + 1] += 1
        cmp[i + 1][j - 1] += 1
        cmp[i + 1][j    ] += 1
        cmp[i + 1][j + 1] += 1
        y = [(i - 1, j - 1), (i - 1, j), (i - 1, j + 1),
             (i, j - 1), (i, j + 1),
             (i + 1, j - 1), (i + 1, j), (i + 1, j + 1)]
        xy1 += y
    return xy1
        
def solve():
    global h, w, left
    initial()
    p_left = left + 1
    count = 0
    xy = [ (i, j) for j in range(1, w) for i in range(1, h)]
    while True:
        count += 1
        xy1 = wave(xy)
        if p_left == left:
            break
        p_left = left
        xy = xy1
    return count - 1

h, w = map(int, input().split())
for _ in range(0, h):
    c = input().strip()
    castle.append([int(x) if x != '.' else 0 for x in c])
ans = solve()
print(ans)
